questions.question: What is your current academic level?
questions.impact: Filters scholarships by academic level - 671 total scholarships available

questions.question: Which college is your major in?

options.label: College of Education and Professional Studies
College of Fine Arts and Design

questions.impact: Determines which majors are available and college-specific scholarships

questions.question: How many credit hours are you taking this semester?
questions.impact: Many scholarships require full-time enrollment (12+ hours undergraduate, 9+ hours graduate)

questions.question: Are you an Oklahoma resident?
questions.impact: Some scholarships are restricted to Oklahoma residents

questions.question: Do you have demonstrated financial need?
questions.impact: Financial need is considered for 113 scholarships

questions.question: Are you willing to write essays for scholarship applications?
questions.impact: Essays are required for 156 different scholarship types

questions.question: Which types of essays are you willing to write?
questions.impact: Filters scholarships based on essay requirements you're willing to fulfill

questions.question: How much time can you dedicate to scholarship applications?

options.label: Moderate (3-5 hours) - Some essays and documents
Substantial (6+ hours) - Multiple essays and detailed applications

questions.impact: Helps prioritize scholarships based on application complexity

gpa_strategy.title: GPA-Based Scholarship Strategy
gpa_strategy.description: Find scholarships that match your GPA range

2.0-2.5.strategy: Focus on need-based and community service scholarships

2.5-3.0.strategy: Mix of merit and need-based opportunities

CEPS.strategy: Highlight teaching philosophy, educational leadership, and community service. Campus involvement is important.

CFAD.strategy: Prepare strong portfolios, artist statements, and demonstrate creative excellence. Community arts involvement helps.

CLA.strategy: Focus on writing skills, academic achievement, and cultural involvement. Personal statements and writing samples are crucial.

CMS.strategy: Focus on research experience, academic excellence, and STEM leadership. Lab experience and technical skills matter.

COB.strategy: Emphasize leadership, internships, and career goals. Professional development and business acumen are valued.

essay_workload.description: Most common essay requirements by frequency

data.early_targets: Start with scholarships requiring only basic information
tips: Prepare standard essays (financial need, personal statement) that can be adapted
Focus on your college-specific scholarships first
Target scholarships with GPA requirements you comfortably meet
Consider the essay-to-award ratio for time management

data.high_competition: Popular majors with many qualified applicants
data.low_competition: Niche majors or specific criteria that limit applicant pool
strategy_tips: Apply for scholarships that match your exact profile
Consider scholarships from your specific college
Look for scholarships with multiple requirements that others might skip

setup_instructions.title: How to Implement Conditional Questions
steps: 1. Create a web form or application interface
2. Implement conditional logic based on question dependencies
3. Connect to scholarship database for real-time filtering
4. Provide immediate feedback on scholarship matches
